author: Bradley Blakeman
title: Bradley Blakeman: Coronavirus failures – here's why China liable for damages caused by COVID-19
description: China clearly knew of the dangers of the virus being studied yet they apparently allowed it to escape the lab and get to the local population, where it spread.
content:

They were behind the wheel driving a car they lost control of. When they hit the first person (patient zero, suspected to be a lab tech) by accident, they panicked. … [+3451 chars]
